tagline: See what they DON'T want you to see. Bus leaves at midnight.
style: mysterious sci-fi, theremin and synths, X-Files vibe
lyrics:
The truth is out there waiting,
Area 51 Tours will take you there!
See what they don't want you to see,
Secrets floating in the air!
Bus leaves at midnight - don't be late!
Area 51 Tours - discover your fate!

notes: Premium tour company for UFO enthusiasts
